changelog_text:
**What's New in v1.7.7:**

**Added:**
• Sleep timer for audios
• Dynamic audio message bubble that adjusts its length based on recording duration and screen width
• Option for choosing custom chats for saved messages
• Automatic localization update after plugin update
• Send comments after forwarded message
• Option to show schedule button always
• Playback speed control for all types of audio

**Fixed:**
• Long click on the performance warning sheet is not working

**Optimized:**
• Voice message time display with caching
• Disable auto web login
